scripts.test: npm run build && k6 run dist/stage-test.js
scripts.export: npm run build && k6 run --out csv=output.csv dist/main/stage-test.js
scripts.monitor: npm run build && docker run --platform linux/amd64 -it -p 5665:5665 -v $(pwd)/dist/main/:/src ghcr.io/grafana/xk6-dashboard:0.7.5 run --out 'dashboard=period=2s' dist/main/stage-test.js
